thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Wendy Martin

author: Wendy Martin
title: Wendy Martin
text:
Buying my ticket online was so easy even when I made a mistake with the date! My electronic ticket came right away. I had a question about the ticket as it had no bar code so I phoned the next day and had excellent service with my question answered and information about baggage which I asked about too! The purchasing of the ticket was clear and easy with all the comparable prices and times right there. For someone who is not computer savvy this was so easy, Thank you!
Wendy Martin
